person_say: I'm facing a new task and don't know where to start.
animal_say: Starting can be tough! What feelings come up for you? Are you feeling overwhelmed or unsure about your capabilities?

person_say: I feel overwhelmed with the new task. It's hard to figure out how to begin.
animal_say: I get it! There’s a brilliant bee named Bizy who specializes in tackling overwhelming tasks. Want to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds wonderful! I would love to get some help with my overwhelming task.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bizy will help you break it down and get started. Let’s buzz over to her!
